document.full_text: the los angeles lakers on tuesday unveiled the new face of the franchise by naming former cleveland cavaliers coach mike brown as the successor to the highly popular and enormously successful phil jackson.
document.title: lakers unveil mike brown as successor to jackson
lines_and_colors: the los angeles lakers on tuesday unveiled the new face of the franchise by naming former cleveland cavaliers coach mike brown as the successor to the highly popular and enormously successful phil jackson.
